author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING IMELDA...
summary: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING IMELDA... As of 8:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 30.7, -71.3 with movement ENE at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IMELDA EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DAMAGING WAVES, AND FLASH FLOODING TO BERMUDA LATER TODAY AND TONIGHT... ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS CURRENTLY INVESTIGATING IMELDA... As of 8:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 01 the center of Imelda was located near 30.7, -71.3 with movement ENE at 21 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Imelda (AT4/AL092025)
